hero.title: Software Engineer & Problem Solver
hero.bio: I am a passionate engineer and problem solver. My previous experiences are in software engineering, system integrations, networking, file transfer protocols, and payment industry (ecommerce, transactions, payments). Good knowledge of algorithms and data structures with solid mathematical fundamentals. I enjoy being a team member and mentoring others.

featuredProjects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
featuredProjects.description: This is a responsive portfolio website built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and it is the one you are viewing right now. It uses standard web technologies together with a simple build process based on Webpack and Handlebars, which helps manage templates and avoid repeating code. A GitHub Action automatically builds and publishes the site to GitHub Pages every time I push changes to the main branch. The background is currently a pink canvas, but I plan to turn it into a 3D environment using Three.js in the future.

featuredProjects.title: Vito Bot
featuredProjects.description: A Discord bot that allows users to manage a Minecraft server hosted in Azure. Mostly teens that don't need to deal with the Azure Portal, can talk to Vito Bot and get the server up and down using commands in the chat. The bot is hosted in Azure, it runs on a small container to contain costs, and use managed identities for authorization. A Github action updates the container automatically.

featuredProjects.title: GForms
featuredProjects.description: A web application for building and managing forms, developed with Go, Angular, and PostgreSQL. It includes a full user management system with registration, email verification, and secure login functionality.
